EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-09-14
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Greenplum 5 and Deploying AutoML to the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 14, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/meet-greenplum-5-the-world-s-first-open-source-multi-cloud-data-platform-built-for-advanced-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Meet Greenplum 5 We’re thrilled to announce the latest innovation to the most powerful, agile, and mission-critical data platform for advanced analytics: Pivotal Greenplum 5. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/meet-greenplum-5-the-world-s-first-open-source-multi-cloud-data-platform-built-for-advanced-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/automated-machine-learning-deploying-automl-to-the-cloud]]> Automated Machine Learning: Deploying AutoML to the Cloud In this blogpost, Chris Rawles shares an AutoML setup to train and deploy pipelines in the cloud using Python, Flask, and two AutoML frameworks that automate feature engineering and model building. Incorporate AutoML into your workflow <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/automated-machine-learning-deploying-automl-to-the-cloud?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/set-it-and-forget-it-6ddd698851be?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Set It and Forget It Jeff Kelly explains when it comes to scaling applications, you should let the platform do the heavy lifting. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/set-it-and-forget-it-6ddd698851be?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/platform-zen-and-the-cloud-foundry-dojo-ep-42?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Platform Zen and the Cloud Foundry Dojo (Ep. 42) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, learn how the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Dojo helps ops teams find "the place of the way" of platform operations with Pivotal's Kevin Mackett and Parker Flemming. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/platform-zen-and-the-cloud-foundry-dojo-ep-42?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/using-sparkr-to-analyze-citi-bike-data?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Using SparkR to Analyze Citi Bike Data Check out Pivotal Data Scientist Greg Tam's SparkR analysis and visualization of Citi Bike's data. Find Out More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/using-sparkr-to-analyze-citi-bike-data?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/data-science?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Data Science: Take a Data-Driven Approach to Business Learn how data science gives companies the foresight needed to better serve customers, develop more compelling products, and drive operational efficiencies. Learn More <[[https://pivotal.io/data-science?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-container-service-at-vmworld-2017-ep-79?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Container Service at VMworld 2017 (Ep. 79) In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Coté and Richard Seroter discuss what Pivotal Container Service is and the types of workloads it seems suited for compared to the existing Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-container-service-at-vmworld-2017-ep-79?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 9/19 Analytics Innovation Roadshow, Denver <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/denver?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
9/21 Pivotal Analytics Day, Kansas City <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-Analytics-Day-Kansas-City.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
9/21 Pivotal Happy Hour, San Francisco <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-SF-Happy-Hour.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
9/25 Redis and Pivotal Cloud Foundry Joint Meetup, San Francisco <[[https://www.meetup.com/San-Francisco-Redis-Meetup/events/241417922/]]>
9/26 Health Innovators: Financing Healthcare Innovation Meetup, Boston <[[https://calendar.google.com/calendar/render?eid=NGViZGNnbjBxdTM1dHFycGVuNjc2czdoN2sgcGl2b3RhbC5pb19sMGlrdW1vYTVwc29jcWQ0aHN0Z2E2NWViMEBn&sf=true&output=xml#eventpage_6]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
